analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0xa032e135d6509c7e13c43f07b567edf4071f5636.sol:
	Contract CryptoExchangeCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xa032e135d6509c7e13c43f07b567edf4071f5636.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0xa032e135d6509c7e13c43f07b567edf4071f5636.sol#75-76) is not in mixedCase
